author: Mental Outlaw
description:
In this video I discuss how Linux is becoming the best OS for gaming and productivity, not just as a result of open source developer efforts, but Microsoft compromising their own OS and turning it into a "Canvas for AI". Zorin OS 18 provides a stable environment for users and makes the transition from Windows easier, while bazzite provides an optimized linux environment for gamers.

My merch is available at
https://based.win/

title: The Best Desktop Linux For Windows Users
